description:
Hello :)
Just a prototype to test out my game 
short few minute total gameplay time hopefully you enjoy.

Controls 
Point and click (mouse) Left click to move Right click to inspect 

Menu at the top left of the screen 

3 diffrent endings, 
1) you just fail to do anything useful 
2) u get lost 
3) u feed the goat !!!

Good luck and enjoy

Thank you (note file size is very large when i try to make it smaller it crashes)
